quiz.question: velvety _____
quiz.explanation: 天鹅绒般的，天鹅绒般的声音。The singer had a smooth, velvety voice that captivated the audience. 歌手有着光滑的天鹅绒般的声音，吸引了观众。

quiz.question: drafty ____
quiz.explanation: 通风的，通风的房间。The drafty room made everyone shiver despite the heater being on. 尽管开着暖气，通风的房间还是让每个人都发抖。

quiz.question: shifty ____
quiz.explanation: 躲闪的，躲闪的眼睛。His shifty eyes made the detective suspicious. 他躲闪的眼睛让侦探起了疑心。

quiz.question: lofty ______
quiz.explanation: 崇高的，崇高的理想。The philosopher spoke of lofty ideals about human dignity. 哲学家谈到了关于人类尊严的崇高的理想。

quiz.question: weighty ______
quiz.explanation: 重要的，重要的事情。The council needed to discuss this weighty matter carefully. 委员会需要仔细讨论这个重要的事情。

quiz.question: ______ ferocity
quiz.explanation: 凶猛，野蛮的凶猛。The tiger attacked with savage ferocity. 老虎以野蛮的凶猛发起攻击。

quiz.question: rapidity __ ______
quiz.explanation: 迅速，变化的迅速。The rapidity of change in technology surprised everyone. 技术变化的迅速让每个人都感到惊讶。

quiz.question: _____ technicality
quiz.explanation: 技术性细节，法律技术性细节。The case was dismissed on a legal technicality. 案件因法律技术性细节被驳回。

quiz.question: ___ __ finality
quiz.explanation: 终结性，终结性的气氛。She spoke with an air of finality that ended the discussion. 她以终结性的气氛说话，结束了讨论。

quiz.question: ______ punctuality
quiz.explanation: 准时，严格的准时。The military demanded strict punctuality from all soldiers. 军队要求所有士兵严格的准时。

quiz.question: __ ___ eventuality
quiz.explanation: 可能性，在任何可能性下。We must be prepared in any eventuality. 我们必须在任何可能性下做好准备。

quiz.question: nobility __ ______
quiz.explanation: 高贵，精神的高贵。Her nobility of spirit inspired others to be better. 她精神的高贵激励他人变得更好。

quiz.question: ______ servility
quiz.explanation: 奴性，卑贱的奴性。The prisoner showed abject servility to avoid punishment. 囚犯表现出卑贱的奴性以避免惩罚。

quiz.question: _____ __ incredulity
quiz.explanation: 怀疑，怀疑地盯着。She would stare in incredulity at the unbelievable news. 她会怀疑地盯着难以置信的新闻。

quiz.question: ____ enmity
quiz.explanation: 敌意，深深的敌意。There was deep enmity between the rival families. 敌对家族之间有深深的敌意。

quiz.question: ______ ___ indignity
quiz.explanation: 侮辱，遭受侮辱。He had to suffer the indignity of public humiliation. 他不得不遭受公开羞辱的侮辱。

quiz.question: _____ hilarity
quiz.explanation: 欢闹，引起欢闹。His silly jokes would cause hilarity among the guests. 他愚蠢的笑话会在客人中引起欢闹。

quiz.question: _____ ____ asperity
quiz.explanation: 严厉，严厉地说话。The teacher would speak with asperity to misbehaving students. 老师会对行为不端的学生严厉地说话。

quiz.question: _____ __ superiority
quiz.explanation: 优越感，优越感。His arrogance came from an inflated sense of superiority. 他的傲慢来自膨胀的优越感。

quiz.question: ___ immensity __ _____
quiz.explanation: 浩瀚，空间的浩瀚。The astronauts were awed by the immensity of space. 宇航员对空间的浩瀚感到敬畏。

quiz.question: _ ____ nonentity
quiz.explanation: 无足轻重的人，仅仅是无足轻重的人。He felt like a mere nonentity in the grand organization. 他在这个宏大的组织中感觉自己仅仅是无足轻重的人。

quiz.question: fruity _____
quiz.explanation: 果香的，果香的香气。The wine had a pleasant fruity aroma. 这酒有令人愉快的果香的香气。

quiz.question: receptivity __ ______
quiz.explanation: 接受能力，对变化的接受能力。The company showed great receptivity to change and innovation. 公司表现出对变化和创新的巨大接受能力。

quiz.question: _______ festivity
quiz.explanation: 庆祝活动，节日庆祝活动。The town was decorated for the holiday festivity. 小镇为节日庆祝活动进行了装饰。

quiz.question: jaunty ____
quiz.explanation: 轻快的，轻快的步伐。He had a jaunty walk that showed his confidence. 他有轻快的步伐，显示出他的自信。

quiz.question: runty ___
quiz.explanation: 矮小的，矮小的孩子。The runty kid grew up to be a successful athlete. 矮小的孩子长大后成为了成功的运动员。

quiz.question: maggoty ____
quiz.explanation: 生蛆的，生蛆的肉。The spoiled maggoty meat had to be thrown away. 腐烂的生蛆的肉不得不被扔掉。

quiz.question: sooty _____
quiz.explanation: 烟灰的，烟灰的烟雾。Sooty smoke rose from the chimney. 烟灰的烟雾从烟囱升起。

quiz.question: hearty ____
quiz.explanation: 丰盛的，丰盛的饭菜。The farmer enjoyed a hearty meal after a long day's work. 农夫在漫长的一天工作后享用了丰盛的饭菜。

quiz.question: warty ______
quiz.explanation: 疣状的，疣状的生长物。The doctor removed the warty growth from his hand. 医生从他手上移除了疣状的生长物。

quiz.question: ___ shirty
quiz.explanation: 生气的，变得生气。Don't get shirty with me just because you had a bad day. 不要因为你过了糟糕的一天就对我变得生气。

quiz.question: hasty ________
quiz.explanation: 仓促的，仓促的决定。His hasty decision led to unfortunate consequences. 他仓促的决定导致了不幸的后果。

quiz.question: pasty __________
quiz.explanation: 苍白的，苍白的肤色。After months indoors, she had a pasty complexion. 在室内呆了几个月后，她有了苍白的肤色。

quiz.question: testy _____
quiz.explanation: 暴躁的，暴躁的回答。The tired manager gave a testy reply to the question. 疲惫的经理对这个问题给出了暴躁的回答。

quiz.question: _ travesty __ _______
quiz.explanation: 歪曲，对正义的歪曲。The unfair trial was a travesty of justice. 不公平的审判是对正义的歪曲。

quiz.question: _____ pigsty
quiz.explanation: 猪圈，脏乱的猪圈。The teenager's room looked like a messy pigsty. 青少年的房间看起来像脏乱的猪圈。

quiz.question: frosty _________
quiz.explanation: 冷淡的，冷淡的接待。The new manager received a frosty reception from the staff. 新经理受到员工冷淡的接待。

quiz.question: musty _____
quiz.explanation: 发霉的，发霉的气味。The old basement had a musty smell. 旧地下室有发霉的气味。

quiz.question: crusty _____
quiz.explanation: 硬皮的，硬皮的面包。The bakery sold fresh crusty bread every morning. 面包店每天早上出售新鲜的硬皮的面包。

quiz.question: __ batty
quiz.explanation: 发疯的，变得发疯。The constant noise was enough to make anyone go batty. 持续的噪音足以让任何人变得发疯。

quiz.question: tatty _______
quiz.explanation: 破旧的，破旧的衣服。The homeless man wore tatty clothes that needed replacing. 无家可归的人穿着需要更换的破旧的衣服。

quiz.question: bitty ______
quiz.explanation: 小块的，小块的碎片。The vase shattered into bitty pieces on the floor. 花瓶在地板上摔成小块的碎片。

quiz.question: gritty _____________
quiz.explanation: 坚韧的，坚韧的决心。Her gritty determination helped her overcome all obstacles. 她坚韧的决心帮助她克服了所有障碍。

quiz.question: knotty _______
quiz.explanation: 棘手的，棘手的问题。The engineers faced a knotty problem that took weeks to solve. 工程师们面临一个花了几周时间才解决的棘手的问题。

quiz.question: potty ________
quiz.explanation: 便盆，便盆训练。The parents started potty training when their child turned two. 父母在孩子两岁时开始便盆训练。

quiz.question: spotty ______
quiz.explanation: 不稳定的，不稳定的记录。His spotty record made employers hesitant to hire him. 他不稳定的记录让雇主犹豫是否雇用他。

quiz.question: nutty ______
quiz.explanation: 坚果味的，坚果味的风味。The coffee had a rich, nutty flavor. 咖啡有浓郁的坚果味的风味。

quiz.question: gravy ____
quiz.explanation: 肉汁，肉汁船。She passed the gravy boat around the dinner table. 她在餐桌上传递肉汁船。

quiz.question: chivy _____
quiz.explanation: 催促，催促前进。The teacher would chivy along the slow students. 老师会催促前进缓慢的学生。

quiz.question: curvy ______
quiz.explanation: 曲线美的，曲线美的身材。The model was celebrated for her curvy figure. 这位模特因其曲线美的身材而受到赞誉。

quiz.question: scurvy _______
quiz.explanation: 坏血病，坏血病疾病。Sailors on long voyages often suffered from scurvy disease due to lack of vitamin C. 长途航行的水手经常因缺乏维生素C而患上坏血病疾病。

quiz.question: chivvy _____
quiz.explanation: 催促，催促前进。The manager would chivvy along the team to meet the deadline. 经理会催促前进团队以赶上截止日期。

quiz.question: dewy ____
quiz.explanation: 水嫩的，水嫩的皮肤。The actress was admired for her youthful, dewy skin. 这位女演员因其年轻水嫩的皮肤而受到羡慕。

quiz.question: sinewy ____
quiz.explanation: 强健的，强健的手臂。The athlete had strong, sinewy arms from years of training. 这位运动员经过多年训练有强壮强健的手臂。

quiz.question: waxy _______
quiz.explanation: 蜡状的，蜡状的堆积。The doctor removed the waxy buildup from the patient's ear. 医生从病人的耳朵里清除了蜡状的堆积。

quiz.question: hazy ______
quiz.explanation: 模糊的，模糊的记忆。She had only a hazy memory of her childhood home. 她对童年家园只有模糊的记忆。

quiz.question: breezy ___
quiz.explanation: 微风的，微风的日子。It was a pleasant breezy day perfect for sailing. 这是一个适合航行的宜人的微风的日子。

quiz.question: ____ dozy
quiz.explanation: 困倦的，感到困倦。The warm afternoon sun made her feel dozy. 温暖的午后阳光让她感到困倦。

quiz.question: gauzy ______
quiz.explanation: 薄纱的，薄纱的织物。She wore a dress made of light, gauzy fabric. 她穿着一件由轻盈薄纱的织物制成的连衣裙。

quiz.question: ____ dizzy
quiz.explanation: 头晕的，感到头晕。The spinning ride made him feel dizzy. 旋转的游乐设施让他感到头晕。

quiz.question: fizzy _____
quiz.explanation: 起泡的，起泡的饮料。The children enjoyed the sweet fizzy drink at the party. 孩子们在派对上享用甜蜜的起泡的饮料。

quiz.question: ___ fez
quiz.explanation: 土耳其帽，红色土耳其帽。The traditional costume included a red fez. 传统服装包括一顶红色土耳其帽。

quiz.question: ________ whiz
quiz.explanation: 能手，电脑能手。The young computer whiz fixed all the technical problems. 年轻的电脑能手解决了所有技术问题。

quiz.question: chintz ________
quiz.explanation: 印花棉布，印花棉布窗帘。The cottage had pretty chintz curtains in the windows. 小屋的窗户上挂着漂亮的印花棉布窗帘。

quiz.question: ____ fizz
quiz.explanation: 嘶嘶声，汽水嘶嘶声。The soda fizz tickled her nose when she drank it. 她喝汽水时，汽水嘶嘶声刺激了她的鼻子。

quiz.question: whizz ____
quiz.explanation: 飞驰而过，飞驰而过。The racing cars would whizz past at incredible speeds. 赛车会以惊人的速度飞驰而过。

quiz.question: _____ fuzz
quiz.explanation: 绒毛，桃子绒毛。The soft peach fuzz covered the fruit's skin. 柔软的桃子绒毛覆盖着水果的皮。
